page.title: 18Red Cross
page.content: On Monday evenings children from the village go to Red Cross at the Burditch Hall.The children meet from 5:30pm to 6:30pm.There are 6 members in the group,and Mrs. Gibbs is the lady in charge.The children do a lot of interesting activities.This includes learning all about First Aid,indoor and outdoor safety as well as learning the Phonetic alphabet.At least once a year the children go to Hill End Camp,near Oxford,for a residential week-end.All the children enter for their First Aid badge,this includes learning how to bandage up wounds and stopping nose bleeds.
